sys_hub_action_type_definition.description:
Retrieves materials (items) based on plant selection criteria from SAP S/4HANA - RFC.

Inputs :

  • Connection Alias - Connection alias for the SAP S/4HANA – RFC spoke.
  • Select BAPI - This field is choice type. User can select standard or custom BAPI.
  • Plant Range Criteria- List of objects containing these fields:
    • Inclusive or exclusive
    • Selection operator [ OPTION ]
    • From plant
    • To plant
  • Material Number Range Criteria- List of objects containing these fields:
    • Inclusive or exclusive
    • Selection operator [ OPTION ]
    • From material number
    • To material number
    • Material Number [ MATNR_HIGH_EXTERNAL ]
    • GUID (External) [ MATNR_HIGH_GUID ]
    • Version Number [ MATNR_HIGH_VERSION ]
    • Material Number [ MATNR_LOW_EXTERNAL ]
    • GUID (External) [ MATNR_LOW_GUID ]
    • Version Number [ MATNR_LOW_VERSION ]
    • Material [ MATNR_LOW_LONG ]
    • Material [ MATNR_HIGH_LONG ]
  • Additional Fields - Additional fields or values you want to add to the details. These fields are retrieved dynamically from SAP S/4HANA - RFC.

Outputs :

  • Material Data - List of materials retrieved from SAP S/4HANA - RFC.
  • JSON Material Data - List of materials retrieved from SAP S/4HANA - RFC.
  • Status - If the request is executed successfully, Status is set to “Success”. If there is a failure in SAP S/4HANA - RFC, Status is set to “Error”.
  • Error Message - Reason for error as returned from SAP S/4HANA - RFC in the RETURN object. Populated only when an error occurs.

Error Messages :

  • No or empty response received from SAP S/4HANA - RFC.
  • Encountered an error. Check log for more details.

To use this action, the corresponding SAP S/4HANA - RFC connection and credential must be created and associated with the SAP_S4HANA_RFC Connection & Credential alias. Learn More

Note: Requires a subscription for production use. Read More.

sys_hub_action_type_snapshot.description:
Retrieves materials (items) based on plant selection criteria from SAP S/4HANA - RFC.

Inputs :

  • Connection Alias - Connection alias for the SAP S/4HANA – RFC spoke.
  • Select BAPI - This field is choice type. User can select standard or custom BAPI.
  • Plant Range Criteria- List of objects containing these fields:
    • Inclusive or exclusive
    • Selection operator [ OPTION ]
    • From plant
    • To plant
  • Material Number Range Criteria- List of objects containing these fields:
    • Inclusive or exclusive
    • Selection operator [ OPTION ]
    • From material number
    • To material number
    • Material Number [ MATNR_HIGH_EXTERNAL ]
    • GUID (External) [ MATNR_HIGH_GUID ]
    • Version Number [ MATNR_HIGH_VERSION ]
    • Material Number [ MATNR_LOW_EXTERNAL ]
    • GUID (External) [ MATNR_LOW_GUID ]
    • Version Number [ MATNR_LOW_VERSION ]
    • Material [ MATNR_LOW_LONG ]
    • Material [ MATNR_HIGH_LONG ]
  • Additional Fields - Additional fields or values you want to add to the details. These fields are retrieved dynamically from SAP S/4HANA - RFC.

Outputs :

  • Material Data - List of materials retrieved from SAP S/4HANA - RFC.
  • JSON Material Data - List of materials retrieved from SAP S/4HANA - RFC.
  • Status - If the request is executed successfully, Status is set to “Success”. If there is a failure in SAP S/4HANA - RFC, Status is set to “Error”.
  • Error Message - Reason for error as returned from SAP S/4HANA - RFC in the RETURN object. Populated only when an error occurs.

Error Messages :

  • No or empty response received from SAP S/4HANA - RFC.
  • Encountered an error. Check log for more details.

To use this action, the corresponding SAP S/4HANA - RFC connection and credential must be created and associated with the SAP_S4HANA_RFC Connection & Credential alias. Learn More

Note: Requires a subscription for production use. Read More.
